DataElement.preferredDefinition: Identifier to uniquely represent an amendment (version) of a protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A change in a document made by correction, adding, substituting or omitting a certain part. Amendments are the mechanism of changes introduction, further development and improvement of previously submitted or approved clinical study protocols and proposals._A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A change in a document made by correction, adding, substituting or omitting a certain part. Amendments are the mechanism of changes introduction, further development and improvement of previously submitted or approved clinical study protocols and proposals.

Concepts.definition: A change in a document made by correction, adding, substituting or omitting a certain part. Amendments are the mechanism of changes introduction, further development and improvement of previously submitted or approved clinical study protocols and proposals.

Property.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Moved to CCR and added concepts to support CDE 2182968 in C3D applications. mc 10.17.18

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
